verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing unto God, sing praises to His name,
Sing unto God, sing praises to His name;
Exalt Him that rideth on the heavens by His name,
Exalt Him that rideth on the heavens by His name,
Exalt Him that rideth on the heavens by His name,
By His name Yah.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And rejoice before Him, and rejoice before Him,
And rejoice, rejoice before Him,
And rejoice, rejoice before Him.
